FuncDef: The display mpls switch-l2vc command displays MS-PW information.
CLIs: display mpls switch-l2vc [ hard-pipe ] [ brief | state { up | down } | <ip-address> <vc-id> encapsulation { atm-1to1-vcc | atm-1to1-vpc | atm-aal5-pdu | atm-aal5-sdu | atm-nto1-vcc | atm-nto1-vpc | atm-trans-cell | cesopsn-basic | ethernet | fr | hdlc | ip-interworking | ip-layer2 | ppp | satop-e1 | satop-e3 | satop-t1 | vlan | cep } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates an IP hard pipe.
-

Displays summary static MS-PW information.
-

Displays information about static MS-PWs with the specified status.
-

Displays information about static MS-PWs in the Up state.
-

Displays information about static MS-PWs in the Down state.
-

Specifies the IP address of a peer PE (usually the LSR ID).
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a VC ID.
The ID is a decimal integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Indicates the PW encapsulation type.
-

One PW carries the AAL5 SDUs of one PVC.
-

One PW carries the AAL5 SDUs of one PVC.
-

One PW carries the AAL5 SDUs of one PVC.
-

One PW carries the AAL5 SDUs of one PVC.
-

One PW carries the ATM cells of multiple PVCs.
-

ATM cells are transmitted over PWE3 VCs.
-

ATM cells are transmitted over PWE3 VCs.
-

Specifies the PW encapsulation type as cesopsn-basic.
-

This encapsulation type is used when Ethernet packets do not carry VLAN information.
-

FR provides protocol standards for the data link layer and physical layer.
-

HDLC is a bit-oriented link layer protocol.
-

Enables heterogeneous media IP interworking between Huawei devices.
-

Enables heterogeneous media IP interworking between a Huawei device and a non-Huawei device.
-

PPP is a link layer protocol that specifies how to encapsulate and transmit network layer packets over P2P links.
-

SAToP is insensitive to the E1 frame structure and encapsulates a whole E1 frame into a PW packet.
-

SAToP is insensitive to the E3 frame structure and encapsulates a whole E3 frame into a PW packet.
-

SAToP is insensitive to the T1 frame structure and encapsulates a whole T1 frame into a PW packet.
-

This encapsulation type is used when Ethernet packets carry VLAN information.
-

This encapsulation type is used for CEP services.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls switch-l2vc hard-pipe 2.2.2.2 2 encapsulation vlan

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you do not specify any parameter, information about all MS-PWs is displayed. To check information about a hard-pipe static VPWS MS-PW after configuring it, run the display mpls switch-l2vc hard-pipe command. If pwId, interface, or state is not configured, information about all hard-pipe static MS-PWs is displayed.
Precautions
If no hard-pipe static MS-PW is configured when you run the display mpls switch-l2vc hard-pipe command, no information is displayed after the command is run.
